last_phrase: In conclusion, the symbolism of alchemy teaches us that it is possible to transform ourselves and our surroundings through the purification of our energies. By meditating on the symbols of the alchemical vases and the purification of the earth (ourselves), we can achieve a state of balance and verticalization.
